originalText.text: World needs to know . She is a absolutely horrible. A patient died under her unethical unfeeling care. She left a patient in restraints for days. Poor kid suffered blood blots and died. My heart goes out to him and his grieving family. She should never be able to practice medicine and in prison. I was a patient on her unit years ago and survived but not unscarred.  I also have survivors guilt now..  i survived her abusive harmful care but this other kid did not..  i’m Sorry to the poor kid and family i didn’t do more to try and stop her from harming your son once i got out of her cluches.
